name: Tidehunter
title: Leviathan
lore: Leviathan hunts the beasts of the deep, using the tide itself to crush his enemies.

gush.name: Gush
gush.description: Sprays water at a target, damaging them and reducing their armor and movement speed.

kraken_shell.name: Kraken Shell
kraken_shell.description: Tidehunter's thick skin blocks damage and removes debuffs after taking enough damage.

anchor_smash.name: Anchor Smash
anchor_smash.description: Swings a massive anchor, damaging enemies and reducing their attack damage.

ravage.name: Ravage
ravage.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to rise and stun all enemies in a huge area.
